thread.title: Susan M.
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Susan M.

author: Susan M.
title: Susan M.
text: I had been looking all over the internet for a dress to wear to my second wedding and in my search I came across a lot of fraudulent sites claiming to have dresses at a bargain price, thankfully, I researched each site thoroughly and continued my search and found the perfect dress, initially on a different site, however, they did not have my size, then I found the dress with Peaches Boutique at the same reasonable price as the other site and they had all sizes stocked. I did my research and called to speak to someone at the Boutique before ordering. Once I ordered, everything went great, from shipping to receiving, I ended up getting the dress in a size too large (but dress was perfect just like the picture), ultimately, I had to call back to return and get the next size down, customer service has been excellent and the newer size dress is on its way. I would highly recommend Peaches Boutique!
